Direct Known Subclasses:
DirectRevelationTest, ElectricityStatsTest, NPTReplicationTest
public abstract class ElectricityTest
extends junit.framework.TestCase

Superclass for tests based on "Market Power and Efficiency in a Computational Electricity Market with Discriminatory Double-Auction Pricing"
Nicolaisen, Petrov, and Tesfatsion IEEE Transactions on Evolutionary Computation, Vol. 5, No. 5. 2001

Version:
$Revision$
Author:
Steve Phelps
